## Specification

| HTTP API | HTTP Method | URL Params                                          | Resource                                                     |
| -------- | ----------- | --------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ |
| INSERT   | POST        | <li> Database Name </li> <li> Collection Name </li> | `/databases/{db}/collections/{collection}/documents/insert`  |
| REPLACE  | PUT         | <li> Database Name </li> <li> Collection Name </li> | `/databases/{db}/collections/{collection}/documents/replace` |

#### JSON Payload

```shell
{
  "documents": [{doc1}, {doc2}...]
}
```

Understanding the request payload:

- The **documents** represent an array of json documents that you want to insert or replace in a collection.
